attributes.action: Stop more and more Imigrants coming into the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Here is an example of why they should be stopped - I live in a luxury apartment block and I pay £650 per month.  The government is paying a company to house them in this block and they have completly wrecked it.  They do not think about their neighbours and generally do not care for the environment in which they are in.

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition already on the site, which you may prefer to sign:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/econmigration/
I fyou would prefer your own to be displayed, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
